analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The theme should be enhanced with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The CSS file needs to be completed with a full intended dark, cosmic theme. The HTML file should include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon. The JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and completed to ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
